about_the_game:
Created with the goal of minimizing the negative effects of gaming, creating a healthier gaming community, and trying to fix the problems that exist in the gaming industry nowadays.

A Healthier Gaming Experience

  • Walk along with other healthier games, Odd Sequence strives to be a wholesome, healthy, and family-friendly game without sacrificing its quality and uniqueness.

  • With the use of non-living characters, you'll never be tempted by all the characters in the game. It will also make this game unique.

  • Actually has low complexity, so you can play without thinking about other things. However, once you explore in depth, you'll understand that some aspects have high complexity.

  • No Internet connection? No problem!

  • The only thing that has an aspect of randomness is the enemy's movement and attack. And the rest is fixed, no rates, no chances, and no probabilities! So, you won't be advantaged or disadvantaged, it purely depends on your own skills!

A Combination of Flat, Minimalist, Geometric and Modern Art Styles

With a light color palette, this game can provide a more relaxing gaming experience. Odd Sequence can be a "best friend" for those who like graphic design with a flat, minimalist, geometric, or modern art style. Who doesn't like a clean interface?

Varied Bot Classes

There are many bot classes that you can use in the game (although there are only 3 right now). Each bot class have its own uniqueness, starting from weapon type, basic attack types, special move types, and ultimate skill types. Try them all and choose that suits you best!

Choose A Weapon and Set of Equipment for Your Bots!

Choose your favorite weapon and set of equipment for your bots. With a wide variety of weapon and equipment effects, you can play with different play styles!

Create Your Own Basic Attack Sequence!

This is one of the exclusive features in Odd Sequence, which may not exist in other games (at least in my experience). A simple basic attack? Or the most powerful one? Or the most effective one? It's up to you, try to make your own! As a result, you might get the basic attack sequence you want, or you might get a weird, unique, and absurd basic attack sequence. Don't forget to adjust each of these basic attacks!

Choose Your Bot's Special Moves and Ultimate Skills to Your Liking!

Do you want a more offensive game? Or a more defensive one? Or a "heal and destroy" one? You can set it up yourself! Combine your best basic attacks, special moves, and ultimate skills to create an undefeatable bot!

"Hack" All the Skill Attributes You Want!

This is one of the exclusive features in Odd Sequence, which may not exist in other games (at least in my experience). With complex status details, you can change the attribute values of all the basic attacks, special moves, and ultimate skills you want. That's right, as long as the attack attributes aren't "fixed", you can modify them according to the right type of attacks! Do you want to mess with those attack attributes? Go ahead, try it if you can!

Skill Tree System is Available!

What is a skill tree? Is it something that is necessary in certain games? Of course it is! With this skill tree, you can strengthen your bot even further. Activate all the skills in this skill tree from root to leaf to unlock all your bot's full potential! This can also give you a satisfying effect, right?

Defeat a Variety of Enemies!

Adapt to the situation in the stage, because the enemies and obstacles in each chapter are different. So, you need to be able to set the right type of stats and attacks to defeat the enemies and complete the chapter.

Fight the enemy bosses and show them who the real boss is! Outsmart these enemy bosses that are technically much stronger than your bots! Will it be a close fight? Hopefully, it won't be a one-way battle.

Other features are equally important:

  • Level up your bot classes, and enhance your weapons and equipment sets.

  • Collect 18 weapons and 48 pieces of gear that can be mixed to suit your play style.

  • Complete 75 stages in the main battle and 18 stages in the weekly challenges. Don't worry, stages will increase after certain patch updates!

  • Defeat all 22 types of enemy families that have a total of 74 types.

  • Search and research the most optimal stats for your bot class.

  • Obtain various rewards by completing tasks, participating in events, and earning achievements.

  • Obtain materials to upgrade your bot classes' skills through the shop and lab.

  • Collect badges to show how good you are at this game.

  • Customize the general difficulty level to your preference. Casual? Hardcore? Try to challenge yourself!

Every human being needs refreshment, and one of them is by playing games. But do it in a good and healthy way. If there are healthier games available, why not? What are you waiting for? Go on, start rolling and defeat all the enemies that come your way!

highlighted.name: I Think I've Seen This Before

name: Odd Sequence

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4300M
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphic 4600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: There are actually no minimum requirements, as long as your PC can run it
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4720HQ / AMD Ryzen 5 2500U or higher
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: This game will prefer a dedicated GPU over integrated one

short_description: Odd Sequence is an indie-action game with armed bots and various RPG elements in platformer gameplay. Geometric characters, a flat and minimalist art style, and fair combat system give this game its uniqueness. This game focuses heavily on the combat aspect and the attack customization.
